summary: The new groundskeeper at the Centennial Sporting Club decides to do something about the very odd goings-on there.
cast: Robert Fields|Nicolas Coster|Margaret Blye|Jack Warden|Richard Dysart|William Roerick|Logan Ramsey|Leon B. Stevens|John Seymour|Helen Craig|Diane Rousseau|Lois Markle|James Noble|Ralph Puroum|Ralph Waite|Jo Ann Harris|Linda Blair|Anne Ramsey|Claiborne Cary|Larry Deer
title: The Sporting Club
